text:
I would like to write an extension of the SVGGraphics2D but the 
DOMGroupManager is not accessible for a sub-class. Is there any objections to 
make it available to sub-classes ?
creator: nicolas.socheleau@bitflash.com
vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
Hello Nicolas,

Do you need 

a) protected access or 
b) get method or
c) get/set methods.

My preferences would be b) then c) then a), but just tell me what you want.

creator: nicolas.socheleau@bitflash.com
